title: 458.03 POWER TO BUILD FACILITIES, CHARGE FEES FOR USE.
text:
A city described in section 458.02 may construct, erect, and maintain on land acquired under that section, docks, quays, levees, wharves, landing places, railroad and other transportation loading and unloading places, water freight and passenger stations, terminals and terminal buildings for carriers, and necessary equipment and appurtenances.
The city council may set reasonable fees for the use of the facilities and necessary equipment and appurtenances described in section 458.02.
